about:
Hi, I'm Shashidhar Sunnapu, a seasoned React.js and React Native developer with over 3 years of experience building responsive web and mobile applications. I specialize in full-stack development using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js, delivering high-performance and scalable solutions. My expertise extends to frameworks like React, React Native, Redux Toolkit, and backend technologies such as Node.js and MongoDB.

  Currently, I lead a team of junior developers, mentoring them and guiding project development to implement effective client solutions. I am passionate about leveraging modern tools and frameworks to optimize performance and maintain clean, efficient code. With a commitment to continuous learning, I enjoy mentoring aspiring developers and staying at the forefront of emerging technologies
